author: MWatson75
title: SDCC Unikitty
review:
I bought this set so that I could add to my growing Unikitty collection. Also, I am trying to obtain all 4 of the exclusive SDCC 2014 minifigures for my collection.

Box/Instructions

The box is the same one as the 2013 and the other three 2014 giveaway (the plastic blister pack with a display bubble). The pieces come in a very small bag, as it only has 16 pieces. The cool thing is that because this minifigure is not pre-built like the others, the instructions come on the inside of the card when it is folded out. Then you have simple instructions to assemble your Cutesykitty (or Cheerykitty depending on what you like).

Parts

As this is only Unikitty, this only comes with 16 pieces. A usual unikitty comes with 14 pieces, but LEGO give you the pieces for a spare head which is nice. There are four exclusive pieces in this set (the two heads and the two eyebrow pieces). The rest of the pieces are available on the Unikitty in the Cloud Cuckoo Palace set which costs $30 down here in Australia ($20 U.S).

Minifigures

This set only comes with Unikitty, but as this a Comic Con exclusive, it will not be available in any other set (That sucks for people who can't get it as there were only 1750 of these made). The Cutesykitty variant is so adorable, and after watching The LEGO Movie again (Great movie by the way) I realized that this variant is in quite a bit of the movie, especially in Cloud Cuckoo Land. The Cheerykitty variant is also really good, although Cutesykitty is my favourite. Both would be good in making a stop-motion.

Overall opinion

This is definitely a great minifigure for anyone's collection, although it may be expensive. I paid around $120 for mine, and I don't regret it at all. If I were you, I would get it only if you really wanted a complete Unikitty (or LEGO Movie) minifigure collection or if you are a person who buys expensive minifigures like this. My personal rating is a 9/10. It would be a 10/10 if it would be available to the general public at a cheaper cost. If you can find this at a reasonable cost, you should buy it as you will love its cuteness (or it's cheeriness).
